text: Rent is a rock musical. The music and lyrics were written by Jonathan Larson. The musical is based on the Italian opera, La boh√®me. The musical opened on Broadway at the Nederlander Theatre on 29 April 1996. It closed on 7 September 2008 after a run of 5,123 performances. It opened on the West End in 2008. In 2005, it was adapted to a movie. Rent won the Tony Award for Best Musical and the Pulitzer Prize for Drama. == Other websites == * Official Rent musical site * Rent Musical on Broadway.com Category:Broadway musicals Category:West End musicals Category:Musicals adapted to movies Category:1990s musicals Category:Rock musicals Category:Tony Award winning musicals Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:1996 works
title: Rent (musical)
